content.raw:
Our \(robotika\) solution docker is based on:

‌

```
FROM osrf/subt-virtual-testbed:subt_solution_latest
```

and it is up-todate:

‌

```
gpu@gpu-desktop:~/git/osgar/subt/docker$ docker pull osrf/subt-virtual-testbed:subt_solution_latest
subt_solution_latest: Pulling from osrf/subt-virtual-testbed
Digest: sha256:f8ba99591b711bfa9d65d246fd6a0e2228a5f38c681c8e08ddbf9bced2342e62
Status: Image is up to date for osrf/subt-virtual-testbed:subt_solution_latest
```

So it was not updated - see the picture:

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/1670603326-obsolete-solution-docker.jpg)
now I realized that it is actually the **TAG**, which is wrong:

[https://hub.docker.com/r/osrf/subt-virtual-testbed/tags](https://hub.docker.com/r/osrf/subt-virtual-testbed/tags)

And motivation? Well, for you to be able to reproduce potential problems with solutions. And for us to have Urban Features available \(I realized that last night that for new artifacts I do not have ID \(BTW I hope that the old ID was not changed\)\):

For `hg log` in `src/subt`

```
changeset:   1680:02697f593970
branch:      tunnel_circuit
tag:         tip
parent:      1677:4bef2b18eb10
parent:      1679:82a4c1004135
user:        Louise Poubel <lupoubel@hotmail.com>
date:        Tue Sep 10 19:57:57 2019 +0000
summary:     Merged in subt_ros_ign_deps (pull request #290)
```

‌

Our (robotika) solution docker is based on:

‌

FROM osrf/subt-virtual-testbed:subt_solution_latest

and it is up-todate:

gpu@gpu-desktop:~/git/osgar/subt/docker$ docker pull osrf/subt-virtual-testbed:subt_solution_latest

So it was not updated - see the picture:

now I realized that it is actually the TAG, which is wrong:

https://hub.docker.com/r/osrf/subt-virtual-testbed/tags

And motivation? Well, for you to be able to reproduce potential problems with solutions. And for us to have Urban Features available (I realized that last night that for new artifacts I do not have ID (BTW I hope that the old ID was not changed)):
